attributes.action: create a central database at the dft of Blue Badge holders to cut down on fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The dft do not have a record of how many Blue Badges are issued in the UK.
with the increase of abuse, a traffic warden may inspect a blue badge, but if it was issued from another borough or county, there is no way to check if it is being misused, stolen or a fake.
